title: Bikepacking gets more PRO with New Performance and Discover bags
content:
PRO, the accessory and component arm of Shimano, just dropped a whole new slate of bags in two ranges: Discover Team and Performance. The bags are cleanly designed and rendered in classic blacks that are sure to look sleek and unobtrusive on road and gravel bikes alike. PRO Discover Team Handlebar and Frame Bag Details

The post Bikepacking gets more PRO with New Performance and Discover bags appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
